::Axis/Lokk::

Lokk listened, and he word 'Maximal' triggered a thought, 
<<Maximals... they must be relatively honourable bots... I think 
that we should stay here for a while unless they prove other 
wise...>> He turns to Axis and Seekker, "Hey, guys, what do ya 
say we stay with these bots for a while, providing they lets us join?"

Axis, thinks, but not for very long, "Sounds good to me," Both wait 
for Seekker.



On 25 Apr 2001, at 0:38, airly2000@... wrote:

> OOC: add this to my last.
> 
> "I don't know if those reasons are enough, Lokk, to convice you that I'm not a menace" said Windlord "Our faction has to main objective survive; we're not allied with any faction here altough a friend and I helped Maximals once a while... I won't told you how many bot are in our faction, 'cause 
until I don't have clear if you're an enemie or a foe, you won't get any information about my friends..."
> 
> Windlord knew that those words could do that Lokk started to attack him, but his loyalty to his friends didn't let him say more.
